Package de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.mysql.mapping.datastore.colhandler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSqlColumnHandler
    An abstract implementation for use with SQL based datastores The implementation checks, wether
    ArrayColumnHandler
    Handles Arrays
    BigDecimalColumnHandler  
    BigIntegerColumnHandler
    A columnhandler to deal BigInteger
    BooleanColumnHandler  
    ByteColumnHandler
    Handles byte and creates TINYINT from it Properties for scale and precision are not used
    CharColumnHandler
    Handles char and Character
    ClassColumnHandler
    Handles Class
    CollectionColumnHandler
    Handles Collection
    DateColumnHandler
    ColumnHandler dealing with instances of Date and Calendar
    DoubleColumnHandler
    Handles Double / Float and creates DOUBLE from it.
    EmbeddedColumnHandler
    Handles embedded objects, which are stored as Json String into a text field
    EnumColumnHandler
    Handles Enum
    IntegerColumnHandler
    Handles Integer and creates INT from it Properties for scale and precision are not used
    JsonColumnHandler
    Handles URI and URL
    LocaleColumnHandler
    Handles Locale
    LongColumnHandler
    Handles Long and creates BIGINT from it.
    MapColumnHandler
    Handles Map
    NumericColumnHandler
    Abstract handler dealing with numerics
    PriceColumnHandler  
    ReferencedColumnHandler
    Handles referenced objects, where the ids are stored inside a Json array as String into the field
    ShortColumnHandler
    Handles short and creates SMALLINT from it Properties for scale and precision are not used
    StringColumnHandler
    StringColumnHandler is used to generate columns which are character based
    UriColumnHandler
    Handles URI and URL
